name: Architect
summary: Independent strategists who love mastering complex systems.

name: Analyst
summary: Innovative thinkers driven by curiosity and elegant solutions.

name: Commander
summary: Visionary organizers who mobilize teams toward ambitious goals.

name: Trailblazer
summary: Curious debaters that spot opportunities and reframe blockers rapidly.

name: Guide
summary: Mission-driven mentors balancing empathy with systems thinking.

name: Storyteller
summary: Creative idealists who translate values into authentic messaging.

name: Activator
summary: Charismatic coaches who rally teams and orchestrate consensus.

name: Spark
summary: Energetic connectors that keep momentum high under ambiguity.

name: Custodian
summary: Disciplined implementers who safeguard quality and reliability.

name: Steward
summary: Reliable caretakers focused on dependable, people-first delivery.

name: Director
summary: Pragmatic organizers that drive clarity, cadence, and measurable output.

name: Coordinator
summary: Insightful collaborators who choreograph smooth stakeholder experiences.

name: Troubleshooter
summary: Action-focused analysts that enjoy fixing complex real-world problems.

name: Craftsperson
summary: Gentle innovators dedicated to crafting intuitive user journeys.

name: Responder
summary: Energetic optimisers thriving on fast-paced operational puzzles.

name: Host
summary: Vibrant storytellers that energise teams and customers alike.
